name: Amazon Rainforest
description: The largest tropical rainforest in the world, home to incredible biodiversity and the Amazon River.

name: Maldives
description: A tropical paradise of white sandy beaches, crystal-clear waters, and abundant marine life.

name: Perito Moreno Glacier
description: One of the few advancing glaciers in the world, located in Los Glaciares National Park.

name: Atacama Desert
description: The driest desert in the world, known for its salt flats, geysers, and otherworldly landscapes.
best_time_to_visit: March to May & September to November

name: Serengeti National Park
description: Famous for the Great Migration and vast African savannah landscapes.

name: Yosemite Falls
description: One of the tallest waterfalls in North America, located in the heart of Yosemite National Park.

name: Matterhorn
description: One of the most photographed mountains in the world, famous for its pyramid shape and alpine beauty.
